Detailed Description

Offers the functions to create and to work with a feed-forward network.

Function Documentation

ostream& operator<< ( ostream &  os,
FFNet &  net 
)

Writes the data of a network to an output stream.

The ModelInterface::inputDimension, ModelInterface::outputDimension, the connectionMatrix and the weightMatrix are written to an output stream. For the syntax of a possible output, see the example section of FFNet(const std::string &filename).

Parameters:
os The output stream to where the data is written.
net The net that will be written to the output stream.
Returns:
Reference to the output stream.
Author:
C. Igel
Date:
2002
Changes
none
Status
stable

Definition at line 1168 of file FFNet.cpp.

References FFNet::connectionMatrix, ModelInterface::inputDimension, ModelInterface::outputDimension, and FFNet::weightMatrix.

istream& operator>> ( istream &  is,
FFNet &  net 
)

Reads the data for the creation of a network from an input stream.

The ModelInterface::inputDimension, ModelInterface::outputDimension, the connectionMatrix and the weightMatrix are read from the input stream, memory for the internal net data structures is reserved and the weight and bias values are written to the parameter vector ModelInterface::w. For the syntax of a possible input, see the example section of FFNet(const std::string &filename).

Parameters:
is The input stream, from which the data is read.
net The net object, to which the data will be copied.
Returns:
Reference to the input stream.
Author:
C. Igel
Date:
2002
Changes
none
Status
stable
